title: Steeley
author: Steeley
created_time: May 16, 2022, 08:50:36 PMLast edit: May 19, 2022, 11:43:42 PM by Steeley
content: Here's a third auction of a coin from the Encyclopedia of Physical Bitcoins and Crypto-Currencies that is somewhat obscure and has been hard to find. For those of you trying pick up one of everything you can find, this coin may be a fun addition to your collection.By the way, usually in forum auctions, discussion is discouraged for the sake of the sale.However, I am encouraging discussion. These threads always end up adding to the history of these coins. If you know something, please share.This auction is for a 2013 Finite by Design 10 Cryptogenic Bullion Bar. It is on page 161 of the Encyclopedia. It is #36 of 50 made. It is loaded with 10 CBX (which I am sure is worth $$$, right? Ok, maybe not...  ) You can see much larger views of the item if you click on the thumbnails and then enlarge them by clicking a second time  STARTING BID:      BTC.0BID INCREMENTS: (limited to 4 decimals) BTC.0001END TIME:             Thursday, May 19th, 17:00 EASTERN (NEW YORK, NY)iso=20220526T17&p0=179&font=cursive&csz=1]https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20220526T17&p0=179&font=cursive&csz=1[/url]PAYMENT:              Due in BTC within 24hours of auction end. Unless I have traded with you before, Escrow with Miner Jones preferred. Shipping                                      cost is responsibility of the buyer.SNIPE:                  Any bid made in the last 5 minutes will extend the auction by 5 minutes and each time a bid is made thereafter, the auction is                                      extended another 5 minutes from the time of the last bid.Good luck and thanks in advance for bidding,SteeleyWinner: VernDog .003

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Verndog on May 19, 2022, 09:00:42 PMThe auction is over right?based on the OP - I would say yes.

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Sheesh, I messed up the date and the timer. I was thinking next thursday but published today. WOw. Verndog is the winner. Apologies to anyone confused in this deal that missed bidding.
